name: list_top_artists
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_scraper.
Tool description: An all-in-one scraper for scraping everything on Spotify, and a highly available download solution for tracks, lyrics and episode previews.
API description: This endpoint lists weekly or daily top artists at any time and in any country.

type.description: Time span for the chart, either `weekly` or `daily`. Defaults to `weekly`.

date.description: Date for the chart in `YYYY-MM-DD` format. Leave blank to get the latest chart.

region.description: `global` or region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2, e.g., `US`). Defaults to `global`.
